entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
